bike.description: Specialized FACT 8r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design w/ Zertz inserts, 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, threaded BB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, full monocoque, Zertz inserts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ 20mm cone spacer and 20mm of spacers
Specialized EliteSet, 3D forged alloy, 12-degree, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp
Specialized Roubaix wrap w/ 2.5 gel pads
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Espoir Sport w/ double BlackBelt, 60 TPI, wire bead, 700x23c
Specialized Espoir Sport w/ double BlackBelt, 60 TPI, wire bead, 700x23c
Chainstay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
